title: Ticket #6856: JobRouter sets the user attribute in the routed job
description:
Farrukh at FNAL noticed that jobs coming through their CE from the same user would sometimes result in the local batch system accounting for the user under the CE UID_DOMAIN (e.g., fkhan@users.opensciencegrid.org) and sometimes under the local batch system UID_DOMAIN (e.g., fkhan@fnal.gov). This is due to the fact that the job router passes along the user attribute to the routed job, which in some cases the batch system schedd fixes to its UID_DOMAIN.

When submitting via Condor-C, the user attribute is removed so the receiving schedd can set it appropriately. We would like the job router to behave the same way.
